mapper.select: SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT shortcutbarname FROM hopeviewshortcutbarpriv WHERE aamid = #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR odeptid = #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY shortcutbarname) b ON hs.shortcutbarname = b.shortcutbarname

SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript,hs.moduleid,b.weight FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT shortcutbarname,weight FROM hopeshortcutbarseq WHERE aamid = #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) b ON hs.shortcutbarname = b.shortcutbarname ORDER BY b.weight ASC

SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript,hs.moduleid,b.weight FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT shortcutbarname,weight FROM hopeshortcutbarseq WHERE deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) b ON hs.shortcutbarname = b.shortcutbarname ORDER BY b.weight ASC

SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript,hs.moduleid,b.weight FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT shortcutbarname,weight FROM hopeshortcutbarseq WHERE privtype = 4) b ON hs.shortcutbarname = b.shortcutbarname ORDER BY b.weight ASC

SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript,hs.moduleid,b.weight FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT shortcutbarname,weight FROM hopeshortcutbarseq WHERE odeptid = #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) b ON hs.shortcutbarname = b.shortcutbarname ORDER BY b.weight ASC

SELECT hm.moduleid,hm.modulename,hm.shortname,hm.description,hm.icon,hm.image,hm.modulegroupname,hm.url FROM hopemodule hm INNER JOIN (SELECT hs.moduleid FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT moduleid FROM hopeviewmodulepriv WHERE aamid = #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR deptid=#{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR odeptid = #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY moduleid) b ON hs.moduleid = b.moduleid WHERE hs.shortcutbarname = #{shortcutbarname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY hs.moduleid) c ON c.moduleid = hm.moduleid WHERE hm.enabled = 1

SELECT hs.shortcutbarname,hs.shortcut_image AS shortcutImage,hs.shortcutbardescript,hs.moduleid,c.weight FROM hopeshortcutbar hs INNER JOIN (SELECT hq.shortcutbarname,hq.weight,hq.privgroupid FROM hopeshortcutbarseq hq INNER JOIN (SELECT privgroupid FROM hopeprivgroup WHERE aamid = #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR deptid=#{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR odeptid = #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY privgroupid) b ON b.privgroupid=hq.privgroupid) c ON hs.shortcutbarname = c.shortcutbarname ORDER BY c.weight ASC
mapper.insert: insert into hopeshortcutbar (shortcutbarid, shortcutbarname, moduleid, shortcutbardescript, shortcut_image) values (#{shortcutbarid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortcutbarname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortcutbardescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortcutImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into hopeshortcutbar
shortcutbarid,
shortcutbarname,
moduleid,
shortcutbardescript,
shortcut_image,

#{shortcutbarname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{moduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shortcutbardescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shortcutImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
